reasoning: The screenshot shows a genuine 404 error page when attempting to access wiki article detail pages. The wiki module is installed and visible in navigation (WIKI TEST menu), but URL routing for article pages is broken, preventing users from viewing or editing any articles.
evidence_summary: Screenshot displays a DNN 404 error page stating 'Sorry, the page you are looking for cannot be found' when trying to access an article detail page. The wiki module is present in the site navigation, indicating the module is installed but its URL routing configuration is not working correctly.
scenario_id: Evoq.Social.Wiki::Article Editing and Updates::Edit article content functionality
